description: "This early 18th century map shows Southeast Asia alongside India and part of China, with the names of cities, towns, ports, rivers and mountains marked. A handwritten note at the top left comments on the map's accuracy."
title: "A new map of the East Indies, [map] : taken from M. de Fer's map of Asia, shewing their cheif [sic] divisions, cities, towns, ports, rivers, mountains &c.."
